# presses(for:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the state of all physical buttons in the event that are associated with a particular gesture recognizer.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func presses(for gesture: UIGestureRecognizer) -> Set<UIPress>
```

## Parameters

- **gesture**: A gesture recognizer.

## Return Value

The set of [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPress] instances that participated in this event that are associated with the gesture recognizer.

## Reading the event button presses

- **allPresses**: The state of all physical buttons in the event.
